entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:54 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
